titleStmt.title: SII 7.432: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 432. (A.R. No. 219 of 1901). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SAME MANDAPA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . kaṭal cūḻnta pārmanṉarum cirmātarum Aṭal cūḻnta pormātarum Amarntu vāḻa ṉāṟkaṭal cūḻnta puvi Eḻum kaṭalpol pukaḻ parappa ĀtiUlakamāmeṉac cotimuṭi Aṇintaruḷi Aṟucamaiyamum Añ mum neṟiyil niṉṟu pālikkat tenṉavaruñ ceralarum ciṅkaḷarum mutalāya manṉavarkaḷ tiṟai cumantu vantiṇṭic cevippa ŪḻiŪḻi Oruceṅkolāḻi pāru miṉitaḷippac cempon virasiṅkācaṉattu Ulakuṭai mukkokkiḻānaṭikaḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakopparakecaripaṟmarāṉa tiripuvanaccakka
ravattikaḷ śrīrājarārājadevaṟku yāṇṭu 10Āvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kāliyūrkkoṭṭattu Erikiḻṉāṭṭuk kuṇṭiĀṟṟut taṇṭalattu Ūrkkuc camaintu maḻavan kūttan kaniyanum veṇmaykiḻavaṉ nampi Utaiyañceytānum matiticelvaṉ kūttaṉum copurava ṉāvalaiyanum kallaikiḻāṉ tiruvanuṭaiyānum Ikkuṭi tiruvaiyāṟaṉ nāvalaiyanum Ikkuṭi Attiyūraṉ piccanum vaṇṇakkaṉ Ātittatevaṉ Oṟṟikoṇṭāṉum mattipeṟṟāṉ U
taiyañceytāṉum Ivvaṉaivom curuṭṭilaiyil maṅkalaṅkiḻān tiruvaṉ celvaṉuṭan Eṅkaḷuṭaṉ nirvaḻakkāṭṭuc cuṭṭi piṇakkiṉa Iṭattu Immaṅkalaṅkiḻān pramātappaṭṭamaiyil Itukku prāyaccittam vitittapaṭikku nāṅka ḷimmaṇṭalattu Eyiṟkoṭṭattu mākaṟalnāṭṭut tirumākaṟal Āḷuṭaiyār tiruvakattiśvaramuṭaiyārkkuc cantirātittavarai celvatāka vaitta tirununtāviḷakkukku Eṅkaḷur kiḻkaḻaniyil viṭṭa nilamn tiruvulakaḷaviṉpaṭi panniraṭikkolāl kuḻi Āyirattukkum kiḻ
pāṟkellai Ūrnilam meḻimuṭoṅkakkum puṟakiṇaṟṟukku meṟkumn tenpāṟkellai curuṭṭilai Ellaikku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai veṇmayaṅkiḻavan kūttaṉpaṭṭikkum Ūrnilam kuḷakuntaṉpaṭṭikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai kallaikiḻāṉ mātaiyaṉ valaimukkāṟpaṭṭikkut teṟkkum Iṉṉānkellaiyuḷḷum Akappaṭṭa ṉilam mukkāṟpaṭṭi kuḻi muṉnuṟum kūttanpaṭṭi kiḻakkaṭaiykku Iṟumpuṟak kiṇaṟu kuḻi Ainñūṟum Ākat taṭi Āyiramum cantrātittavarai celvatāka .
Digital edition of SII 7.432 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
